name: THE Innovation and Impact Summit 2024 | Delhi, India | 10-12 December
content: Join some of the world's most inspiring thought leaders and influential changemakers to explore how higher education can implement fair and sustainable approaches that blend technology, processes and services to address some of the world's most pressing challenges, including climate change and health emergencies. Attendees will be asked to draw upon their own experience and expertise to discuss the following topics: - Disruptive innovation for social change - Leading innovations for brighter futures: space, agriculture, healthcare - Today's graduates, tomorrow's innovators Delegates can expect keynotes, interactive panels, live demonstrations, intimate discussions, practical workshops, unparalleled networking and much more. Interested in partnering with THE? Get in touch with the team at partner@timeshighereducation.com to find out how THE can help you elevate your brand. URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/2555703-0?pid=4868 Date and Time: On Tuesday December 10, 2024 at 8:00 am to Thursday December 12, 2024 at 3:00 pm Venue details: Pullman New Delhi Aerocity, Asset No 2, Indira Gandhi International Airport, Gmr Hospitality District, Aerocity, New Delhi, Delhi, 110037, India Category: Conferences | Education | Higher Education Prices: Universities: USD 495.00, Corporate: USD 1595.00
